item.title: Add ::master and ::item to my 508/525 server ( help me )
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“mangalover51, post:14, topic:334106”]oh, a loop that transfers to all the levels? i see… sorry then.[/quote]Kinda. It doesn’t exactly ‘transfer’ at all.
http://mindprod.com/jgloss/forloop.html
Loops are rather basic Java and you should learn them, they are useful.

oh, a loop that transfers to all the levels? i see… sorry then. so… then it gives all the levels there is to that amount of exp then there is no way to this for ex. like if you wanted your thieve skill to get 17m exp but all the other skills to do 13m exp there is no way to change that then…

item.title: Add ::master and ::item to my 508/525 server ( help me )
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for(int i = 0; i < 23; i++){ p.skillLvl[i] = 99; p.skillXP[i] = 13036000; p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, i); } p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; }

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { p.skillLvl[0] = 99; p.skillXP[0] = 13036000; for(int i = 2; i < 5; i++){ p.skillLvl[i] = 99; p.skillXP[i] = 13036000; } p.skillLvl[1] = 1; p.skillXP[1] = 0; p.skillLvl[5] = 52; p.skillXP[5] = 125000; p.skillLvl[6] = 99; p.skillXP[6] = 13036000; for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++){ p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, i); } p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; }

Shorten’d enuf?

Read full topic

item.title: Add ::master and ::item to my 508/525 server ( help me )
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

                } else if (cmd[0].equals("item") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("yournamehere")) {
                    Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]),
                            Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

and the second 1 you need to add:

} else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
                    Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]),
                            Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

if those don’t work, pm me and i will help you further

Read full topic

item.title: Add ::master and ::item to my 508/525 server ( help me )
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

heres master command i won’t be able to fit the ::item command sorry. just post reply and i can post agin…

commands.java searchp.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX, p.absY, 0, 10);

you may have more codes under the code above like this so just put the code below the end of the stuff you know…p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX, p.absY, 0, 10); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+1, p.absY, 0, 9); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+2, p.absY, 0, 8); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+3, p.absY, 0, 7); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+4, p.absY, 0, 6); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+5, p.absY, 0, 5); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+6, p.absY, 0, 4); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+7, p.absY, 0, 3); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+8, p.absY, 0, 2); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+9, p.absY, 0, 1); //p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX+10, p.absY, 0, 0);

below that add [code]}
else if(cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
p.skillLvl[0] = 136;
p.skillXP[0] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[1] = 136;
p.skillXP[1] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[2] = 136;

p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 0);
